text: Trump International Golf Club, West Palm Beach, Florida is a 27-hole private golf course designed by Jim Fazio in West Palm Beach, Florida, This is Donald Trump's first golf course. == Assassination attempt == On September 15, 2024, the Secret Service fired on a suspect named Ryan Wesley Routh, believed to be a suspect in an attempted assassination of Donald Trump, while Trump was golfing at his club, at 2:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time. Routh then fled but was recaptured. The incident is being investigated as a second assassination attempt by the FBI, Secret Service, and the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office. == References == Category:1999 establishments in the United States Category:1999 establishments Category:1999 establishments in North America Category:Donald Trump
title: Trump International Golf Club (West Palm Beach, Florida)
